coreInfo.description: Corelogic is a comprehensive system that helps behavioral health agencies through the patient treatment lifecycle. This includes not only medical treatment-related stuff but also aids agencies with the financial elements. Currently, a batch process exists that ¿DOES WHAT?... WHAT IS THE PROBLEM WITH THAT??? WHY ARE WE CREATING A NEW CHARGES PROCESS AND WHAT IS IT GOING TO SOLVE? WHY IS IT GOING TO BE BETTER?

coreInfo.label: Capture Appointments in status Kept
coreInfo.description: The system needs to identify whenever there is an appointment that just changed its status to "Kept"
coreInfo.impact: This will allow initiating the process of evaluating/creating the corresponding charge.

coreInfo.label: Evaluate Appointments
coreInfo.description: Appointments in status Kept should be evaluated to determine if a charge should be created.
coreInfo.impact: This is the main business logic that will determine if an appointment meets the requirements to produce a charge.

coreInfo.label: Produce a Charge
coreInfo.description: After it has been determined that a charge can be created out of an appointment, the charge should be created
coreInfo.impact: The charge entity will contain all details about the charge

coreInfo.label: Persist charges
coreInfo.description: Any charge created out of an appointment must be persisted in a database.
coreInfo.impact: Persisted charges will eventually be used to create a Claim

coreInfo.label: Notify errors
coreInfo.description: In case there is an error when processing an appointment, an assigned user should be notified with a detailed description of the error.
coreInfo.impact: The assigned user could take corrective action based on the error description.

coreInfo.label: Capture Appointment changes in Near Real Time
coreInfo.description: Appointments

coreInfo.label: Evaluate Kept Appointments in Near Real Time
Create Charges in Near Real Time

id="aoditsystem_3BdO0BYoN0I_3Beh5ET5RND_433BuPNwqbkCj" value="React App" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="146" y="640" width="120" height="40" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="aoditsystem_3BdO0BYoN0I_3Beh5ET5RND_443BuPNwqkEk1" value="<div style="text-align: left"><div><b>BUSINESS CONTEXT</b></div><div><b><br></b></div><ul><li><span>A charge is a different entity from Appointment or Claim</span></li><li><span>A charge can only be created out of a appointment in Kept</span></li><li>A Kept appointment does not guarantee the creation of a Charge. Validations must be run</li><li>A charge depends only on one Appointment and not on other Charges or different appointment</li><li>A charge can only be created once out of an appointment</li><li>A kept appointment should not change after it is marked as Kept.... a new appointment should be created</li><li>Charges can't be reverted.&nbsp;</li><li>No need to show users the charges</li><li>What if an appointment changed other fields but the status while in kept and while in processing? It should not change... same as 6</li><li>Business Logic to validate appointments / create charges is already in Carelogic / Financial Domain (or most of it) ... no need to add new components like Decisions</li></ul></div>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=top;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="31" y="866" width="560" height="260" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="aoditsystem_3BdO0BYoN0I_3Beh5ET5RND_453BuPNwqIzfH" value="<div style="text-align: left"><div><b>REQUIREMENTS</b></div><div><b><br></b></div><ol><li>Need to create charges in NRT</li><li>Given the time, we can reuse existing components: Shareplex and Kafka in place listening for status changes of appointments</li><li>Retry due to network errors can be handled by the Consumer, however, a retry queue is suggested in case retry or fail logic changes in the future</li><li>A tracking dashboard is suggested to review what happened to the processing of appointments</li><li>From the dashboard, we could manually trigger retries for failed appointments or we can have a daily/weekly batch process</li><li>Quarkus is suggested due to its small footprint and non blocking threads</li><li>Depending on the kind of calculations more topics could be created to create distributed transactions</li></ol></div>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=top;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="600" y="860" width="500" height="210" as="geometry"/></mxCell></root></mxGraphModel>

id="aodusagescenario_3BiiUemxOEp_433BiiUl5I24E" value="React App" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="146" y="640" width="120" height="40" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="aodusagescenario_3BiiUemxOEp_443BiiUl5hZgL" value="<div style="text-align: left"><div><b>BUSINESS CONTEXT</b></div><div><b><br></b></div><ul><li><span>A charge is a different entity from Appointment or Claim</span></li><li><span>A charge can only be created out of a appointment in Kept</span></li><li>A Kept appointment does not guarantee the creation of a Charge. Validations must be run</li><li>A charge depends only on one Appointment and not on other Charges or different appointment</li><li>A charge can only be created once out of an appointment</li><li>A kept appointment should not change after it is marked as Kept.... a new appointment should be created</li><li>Charges can't be reverted.&nbsp;</li><li>No need to show users the charges</li><li>What if an appointment changed other fields but the status while in kept and while in processing? It should not change... same as 6</li><li>Business Logic to validate appointments / create charges is already in Carelogic / Financial Domain (or most of it) ... no need to add new components like Decisions</li></ul></div>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=top;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="30" y="860" width="560" height="260" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="aodusagescenario_3BiiUemxOEp_453BiiUl5btd5" value="<div style="text-align: left"><div><b>REQUIREMENTS</b></div><div><b><br></b></div><ol><li>Need to create charges in NRT</li><li>We have Shareplex and Kafka in place listening for status changes of appointments</li><li>Retry due to network errors can be handled by the Consumer, however, a retry queue is suggested in case retry or fail logic changes in the future</li><li>A tracking dashboard is suggested to review what happened to the processing of appointments</li><li>From the dashboard, we could manually trigger retries for failed appointments or we can have a daily/weekly batch process</li><li>Quarkus is suggested due to its small footprint and non blocking threads</li><li>Depending on the kind of calculations more topics could be created to create distributed transactions</li></ol></div>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=top;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="600" y="860" width="500" height="210" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="aodusagescenario_3BiiUemxOEp_1013BiiXKFuRUS" style="" parent="1" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="aoditsystem_3BdO0BYoN0I_3HO2YcGXWmH_473Ma2wEDvO6b" value="Fails create empty charges? Batch would go here?" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeWidth=12;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="895" y="480" width="90" height="70" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="aoditsystem_3BdO0BYoN0I_3HO2YcGXWmH_483Ma2wED2Ufb" value="<div><span>BUSINESS CONTEXT</span></div><div><span><br></span></div><ul><li>A charge is a different entity from Appointment or Claim</li><li>A charge can only be created out of a appointment in Kept</li><li>A Kept appointment does not guarantee the creation of a Charge. Validations must be run</li><li>A charge depends only on one Appointment and not on other Charges or different appointment</li><li>A charge can only be created once out of an appointment</li><li>A kept appointment should not change after it is marked as Kept.... a new appointment should be created</li><li>Charges can't be reverted.&nbsp;</li><li>No need to show users the charges</li><li>What if an appointment changed other fields but the status while in kept and while in processing? It should not change... same as 6</li><li>Business Logic to validate appointments / create charges is already in Carelogic / Financial Domain (or most of it) ... no need to add new components like Decisions</li><li>Order is not important between different appointments, they are independent in terms of charge creation. No need to preserve partitions</li></ul>" style="text;html=1;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;align=left;verticalAlign=top;spacingTop=-4;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="50" y="800" width="40" height="20" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="aoditsystem_3BdO0BYoN0I_3HO2YcGXWmH_493Ma2wEDkm0o" value="<div><span>REQUIREMENTS</span></div><div><span><br></span></div><ol><li>Need to create charges in NRT</li><li>Given the time, we can reuse existing components: Shareplex and Kafka in place listening for status changes of appointments</li><li>Retry due to network errors can be handled by the Consumer, however, a retry queue is suggested in case retry or fail logic changes in the future</li><li>A tracking dashboard is suggested to review what happened to the processing of appointments</li><li>From the dashboard, we could manually trigger retries for failed appointments or we can have a daily/weekly batch process</li><li>Quarkus is suggested due to its small footprint and non blocking threads</li><li>Depending on the kind of calculations more topics could be created to create distributed transactions</li></ol>" style="text;html=1;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;align=left;verticalAlign=top;spacingTop=-4;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="76" y="1020" width="40" height="20" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="aoditsystem_3BdO0BYoN0I_3HO2YcGXWmH_503Ma2wEDYAy2" value="<div style="text-align: left"><span>TRACKING DATA</span></div><div style="text-align: left"><span><br></span></div><div style="text-align: left"><span>Source: Who is sending the message</span></div><div style="text-align: left"><span>Target: Recipient of the message</span></div><div style="text-align: left"><span>Status: IN PROCESS, FAILED, RETRY, COMPLETED</span></div><div style="text-align: left"><span>Request: Json Data</span></div><div style="text-align: left">Response: Json Data. Can contain sub status to be used by apps<br></div><div style="text-align: left">Timestamp:</div><div style="text-align: left">Endpoint: Where was the data sent if it was a service or the topic / queue name</div><div style="text-align: left">Attempts: Counter. 1 By default and can be used by apps before deciding it was a failed or take another action</div><div style="text-align: left">&nbsp;</div>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=top;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeWidth=12;horizontal=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="74" y="1200" width="485" height="230" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="aoditsystem_3BdO0BYoN0I_3HO2YcGXWmH_513Ma2wEDtH3x" style="rounded=0;html=1;entryX=0.75;entryY=0;jettySize=auto;orthogonalLoop=1;strokeColor=#FF8000;strokeWidth=2;" parent="1" source="aoditsystem_3BdO0BYoN0I_3HO2YcGXWmH_203Ma2wECZSXW" target="aoditsystem_3BdO0BYoN0I_3HO2YcGXWmH_103Ma2wECEw3J" edge="1" modelId="logicalconnection_3HVeIwiwXAq"><mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="aoditsystem_3BdO0BYoN0I_3HO2YcGXWmH_523Ma2wEDYL2V" value="<span>300,000 Msgs / Min</span>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeWidth=12;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="220" y="220" width="115" height="35" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="aoditsystem_3BdO0BYoN0I_3HO2YcGXWmH_533Ma2wEDXewK" value="CRUD" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeWidth=12;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="698" y="190" width="77" height="33" as="geometry"/></mxCell></root></mxGraphModel>

source="aodusagescenario_3HUUonuZnE5_203HUUor3qqRA" target="aodusagescenario_3HUUonuZnE5_373HUUor3Jc36" edge="1" modelId="logicalconnection_3HUNOUp8XvT"><mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="aodusagescenario_3HUUonuZnE5_493HUUor4vqiE" value="Fails create empty charges? Batch would go here?" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeWidth=12;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="910" y="491" width="90" height="70" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="aodusagescenario_3HUUonuZnE5_503HUUor4MTHZ" value="<div><span>BUSINESS CONTEXT</span></div><div><span><br></span></div><ul><li>A charge is a different entity from Appointment or Claim</li><li>A charge can only be created out of a appointment in Kept</li><li>A Kept appointment does not guarantee the creation of a Charge. Validations must be run</li><li>A charge depends only on one Appointment and not on other Charges or different appointment</li><li>A charge can only be created once out of an appointment</li><li>A kept appointment should not change after it is marked as Kept.... a new appointment should be created</li><li>Charges can't be reverted.&nbsp;</li><li>No need to show users the charges</li><li>What if an appointment changed other fields but the status while in kept and while in processing? It should not change... same as 6</li><li>Business Logic to validate appointments / create charges is already in Carelogic / Financial Domain (or most of it) ... no need to add new components like Decisions</li></ul>" style="text;html=1;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;align=left;verticalAlign=top;spacingTop=-4;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="50" y="800" width="40" height="20" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="aodusagescenario_3HUUonuZnE5_513HUUor4qfPh" value="<div><span>REQUIREMENTS</span></div><div><span><br></span></div><ol><li>Need to create charges in NRT</li><li>Given the time, we can reuse existing components: Shareplex and Kafka in place listening for status changes of appointments</li><li>Retry due to network errors can be handled by the Consumer, however, a retry queue is suggested in case retry or fail logic changes in the future</li><li>A tracking dashboard is suggested to review what happened to the processing of appointments</li><li>From the dashboard, we could manually trigger retries for failed appointments or we can have a daily/weekly batch process</li><li>Quarkus is suggested due to its small footprint and non blocking threads</li><li>Depending on the kind of calculations more topics could be created to create distributed transactions</li></ol>" style="text;html=1;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;align=left;verticalAlign=top;spacingTop=-4;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="36" y="1000" width="40" height="20" style="text-align: left"><span>Status: IN PROCESS, FAILED, RETRY, COMPLETED</span></div><div style="text-align: left"><span>Request: Json Data</span></div><div style="text-align: left">Response: Json Data. Can contain sub status to be used by apps<br></div><div style="text-align: left">Timestamp:</div><div style="text-align: left">Endpoint: Where was the data sent if it was a service or the topic / queue name</div><div style="text-align: left">Attempts: Counter. 1 By default and can be used by apps before deciding it was a failed or take another action</div><div style="text-align: left">&nbsp;</div>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=top;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeWidth=12;horizontal=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="45" y="1180" width="485" height="230" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="aodusagescenario_3HUUonuZnE5_1153HUUsVTwdiY" style="" parent="1" modelId="usagestep_3HUUsVTtMhI"/><mxCell id="aodusagescenario_3HUUonuZnE5_1203HUUz7ltHDx" style="" parent="1" modelId="usagestep_3HUUz7lZjwa"/><mxCell id="aodusagescenario_3HUUonuZnE5_1233HUUAsuAMcM" style="" parent="1" modelId="usagestep_3HUUAstTzUp"/><mxCell id="aodusagescenario_3HUUonuZnE5_1603HUWclQlk7I" style="" parent="1" modelId="usagestep_3HUWclQcbs2"/><mxCell id="aodusagescenario_3HUUonuZnE5_1693HUWILLubbO" style="" parent="1" modelId="usagestep_3HUWILKMDKe"/><mxCell id="aodusagescenario_3HUUonuZnE5_1723HUWKbIBj71" style="" parent="1" modelId="usagestep_3HUWKbHZ3tJ"/><mxCell id="aodusagescenario_3HUUonuZnE5_1753HUWMQvOg8u" style="" parent="1" modelId="usagestep_3HUWMQvieJn"/></root></mxGraphModel>

coreInfo.description: Shareplex captures all kinds of events and sends them into the corresponding account topic
The financial domain handles business logic in async way, updates its database, and sends a response through the charges response topic.

Charges Consumer updates the Tracking Database and gets a Tracking Id that will be forwarded in the topic.
The Charges consumer receives all messages and filters the Kept Appointments and collects them into a single shared Appointments Request Topic.
Tracking Service updates the tracking db and returns a tracking id
Filtered messages are put in the Charges Request Topic to be processed by the financial domain. In the future different type of messages other than appointments could create charges

modelId="logicalconnection_3HU6vqIx2Jo_3LjaSosVDfo"><mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="aoditsystem_3BdO0BYoN0I_3HO2YcGXWmH_3LjaSosVDfo_473LjaMDe5HX1" value="Fails create empty charges? Batch would go here?" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeWidth=12;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="895" y="480" width="90" height="70" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="aoditsystem_3BdO0BYoN0I_3HO2YcGXWmH_3LjaSosVDfo_483LjaMDeXThj" value="<div><span>BUSINESS CONTEXT</span></div><div><span><br></span></div><ul><li>A charge is a different entity from Appointment or Claim</li><li>A charge can only be created out of a appointment in Kept</li><li>A Kept appointment does not guarantee the creation of a Charge. Validations must be run</li><li>A charge depends only on one Appointment and not on other Charges or different appointment</li><li>A charge can only be created once out of an appointment</li><li>A kept appointment should not change after it is marked as Kept.... a new appointment should be created</li><li>Charges can't be reverted.&nbsp;</li><li>No need to show users the charges</li><li>What if an appointment changed other fields but the status while in kept and while in processing? It should not change... same as 6</li><li>Business Logic to validate appointments / create charges is already in Carelogic / Financial Domain (or most of it) ... no need to add new components like Decisions</li><li>Order is not important between different appointments, they are independent in terms of charge creation. No need to preserve partitions</li></ul>" style="text;html=1;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;align=left;verticalAlign=top;spacingTop=-4;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="50" y="800" width="40" height="20" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="aoditsystem_3BdO0BYoN0I_3HO2YcGXWmH_3LjaSosVDfo_493LjaMDeqFIu" value="<div><span>REQUIREMENTS</span></div><div><span><br></span></div><ol><li>Need to create charges in NRT</li><li>Given the time, we can reuse existing components: Shareplex and Kafka in place listening for status changes of appointments</li><li>Retry due to network errors can be handled by the Consumer, however, a retry queue is suggested in case retry or fail logic changes in the future</li><li>A tracking dashboard is suggested to review what happened to the processing of appointments</li><li>From the dashboard, we could manually trigger retries for failed appointments or we can have a daily/weekly batch process</li><li>Quarkus is suggested due to its small footprint and non blocking threads</li><li>Depending on the kind of calculations more topics could be created to create distributed transactions</li></ol>" style="text;html=1;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;align=left;verticalAlign=top;spacingTop=-4;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="76" y="1020" width="40" height="20" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="aoditsystem_3BdO0BYoN0I_3HO2YcGXWmH_3LjaSosVDfo_503LjaMDeq1rr" value="<div style="text-align: left"><span>TRACKING DATA</span></div><div style="text-align: left"><span><br></span></div><div style="text-align: left"><span>Source: Who is sending the message</span></div><div style="text-align: left"><span>Target: Recipient of the message</span></div><div style="text-align: left"><span>Status: IN PROCESS, FAILED, RETRY, COMPLETED</span></div><div style="text-align: left"><span>Request: Json Data</span></div><div style="text-align: left">Response: Json Data. Can contain sub status to be used by apps<br></div><div style="text-align: left">Timestamp:</div><div style="text-align: left">Endpoint: Where was the data sent if it was a service or the topic / queue name</div><div style="text-align: left">Attempts: Counter. 1 By default and can be used by apps before deciding it was a failed or take another action</div><div style="text-align: left">&nbsp;</div>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=top;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeWidth=12;horizontal=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="74" y="1200" width="485" height="230" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="aoditsystem_3BdO0BYoN0I_3HO2YcGXWmH_3LjaSosVDfo_513LjaMDezENK" style="rounded=0;html=1;entryX=0.75;entryY=0;jettySize=auto;orthogonalLoop=1;strokeColor=#FF8000;strokeWidth=2;" parent="1" source="aoditsystem_3BdO0BYoN0I_3HO2YcGXWmH_3LjaSosVDfo_203LjaMDd5brC" target="aoditsystem_3BdO0BYoN0I_3HO2YcGXWmH_3LjaSosVDfo_103LjaMDdyfWh" edge="1" modelId="logicalconnection_3HVeIwiwXAq_3LjaSosVDfo"><mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="aoditsystem_3BdO0BYoN0I_3HO2YcGXWmH_3LjaSosVDfo_523LjaMDeR4t8" value="<span>?? Msgs / Min</span>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeWidth=12;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="220" y="220" width="115" height="35" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="aoditsystem_3BdO0BYoN0I_3HO2YcGXWmH_3LjaSosVDfo_533LjaMDeYCYH" value="CRUD" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeWidth=12;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="698" y="190" width="77" height="33" as="geometry"/></mxCell></root></mxGraphModel>
